member.name: IFsiItem.FileSystemName
member.summary: Retrieves the name of the item as modified to conform to the specified file system.
member.param: File system to which the name should conform. For possible values, see the enumeration type.

String that contains the name of the item as it conforms to the specified file system. The name in the property is modified if the characters used and its length do not meet the requirements of the specified file system type.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
The value specified for parameter %1!ls! is not valid.
Value: 0xC0AAB101

member.name: IFsiItem.FileSystemPath
member.summary: Retrieves the full path of the item as modified to conform to the specified file system.
member.param: File system to which the path should conform. For possible values, see the enumeration type.

String that contains the full path of the item as it conforms to the specified file system. The path in the property is modified if the characters used and its length do not meet the requirements of the specified file system type.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
The value specified for parameter %1!ls! is not valid.
Value: 0xC0AAB101

member.name: IFsiItem.get_CreationTime
member.summary: Retrieves the date and time that the directory or file item was created and added to the file system image.
member.param: Date and time that the directory or file item was created and added to the file system image, according to UTC time.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFsiItem.get_FullPath
member.summary: Retrieves the full path of the file or directory item in the file system image.
member.param: String that contains the absolute path of the file or directory item in the file system image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFsiItem.get_IsHidden
member.summary: Determines if the item's hidden attribute is set in the file system image.
member.param: Is VARIANT_TRUE if the hidden attribute of the item is marked in the file system image; otherwise, VARIANT_FALSE.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFsiItem.get_LastAccessedTime
member.summary: Retrieves the date and time the directory or file item was last accessed in the file system image.
member.param: Date and time that the item directory or file was last accessed in the file system image, according to UTC time.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IFsiItem.get_LastModifiedTime
member.summary: Retrieves the date and time that the directory or file item was last modified in the file system image.
member.param: Date and time that the directory or file item was last modified in the file system image, according to UTC time.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IFsiItem.get_Name
member.summary: Retrieves the name of the directory or file item in the file system image.
member.param: String that contains the name of the file or directory item in the file system image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IFsiItem.put_CreationTime
member.summary: Sets the date and time that the directory or file item was created and added to the file system image.
member.param: Date and time that the directory or file item was created and added to the file system image, according to UTC time. Defaults to the time the item was added to the image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
FileSystemImage object is in read only mode.
Value: 0xC0AAB102

Failed to allocate necessary memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IFsiItem.put_IsHidden
member.summary: Determines if the item's hidden attribute is set in the file system image.
member.param: Set to VARIANT_TRUE to set the hidden attribute of the item in the file system image; otherwise, VARIANT_FALSE. The default is VARIANT_FALSE.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
FileSystemImage object is in read only mode.
Value: 0xC0AAB102

Failed to allocate necessary memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IFsiItem.put_LastAccessedTime
member.summary: Sets the date and time that the directory or file item was last accessed in the file system image.
member.param: Date and time that the directory or file item was last accessed in the file system image, according to UTC time. Defaults to the time the item was added to the image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
FileSystemImage object is in read only mode.
Value: 0xC0AAB102

Failed to allocate necessary memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IFsiItem.put_LastModifiedTime
member.summary: Sets the date and time that the item was last modified in the file system image.
member.param: Date and time that the directory or file item was last modified in the file system image, according to UTC time. Defaults to the time the item was added to the image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
FileSystemImage object is in read only mode.
Value: 0xC0AAB102

Failed to allocate necessary memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

summary.para: Base interface containing properties common to both file and directory items.
To access the properties of this interface, use the or interface.
